archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Compliance
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
E.g. Legal compliance: Health and Safety, IPR, FOI Licensing etc. E.g. Internal Policy compliance: sustainability policy (David Clarke v supporting of Greening Events project for example as Scope 3 Emissions may be something that HEFCE get us to report on at some point), Open Access?, Key Infomation Sets, accessibility policy etc.
https://wikis.bris.ac.uk/display/~nr8262/Legislation+or+Compliance+that+affects+IT
